content.title: Asangathit Karmakar Samachar-Patr Hawker Cycle Sahayata Yojana
content.details: Labor Department of Chhattisgarh State started this scheme 'Asangathit Karmakar Samachar-Patr Hawker Cycle Sahayata Yojana' for unorganized worker on 10 September 2010. Under this scheme, One cycle will be provided free of cost to each unorganized beneficiary. The main objective of the scheme to empower the unorganized Samaachaar-Patr Hokar worker through provide them free cycle.
benefits: A free of cost cycle will be provided.
eligibility: This scheme is for unorganized newspaper delivery workers (hawker) registered in any district of the state.
Newspaper delivery workers (hawker) are not eligible for this scheme if they receive benefits from a parallel scheme.

faqs.question: What is this scheme?
faqs.answer: Chhattisgarh State Government started a scheme 'Asangathit Karmakar Samachar-Patr Hawker Cycle Sahayata Yojana' for unorganized worker on 10 September 2012.

faqs.question: What is the objective of the scheme?
faqs.answer: The main objective of the scheme to empower the unorganized Samaachaar-Patr (hawker) worker through provide them free cycle.

faqs.question: What are the benefits?
faqs.answer: A free of cost cycle will be provided.

faqs.question: Who can get the benefits?
faqs.answer: All eligible registered unorganized labor individuals from Chhattisgarh State.

faqs.question: Can a beneficiary get the scheme benefit twice?
If applicant also received similar benefits from any other parallel scheme, is he/she eligible to get this scheme benefits?
What is the procedure to apply for the scheme?
faqs.answer: Applicant must be registered under 'Chhattisgarh Unorganized Workers State Social Security Board'. Only then applicant can apply for the scheme.

faqs.question: How can applicant register under Chhattisgarh Unorganized Workers State Social Security Board?
faqs.answer: All the applicant have to visit the official website Chhattisgarh Labour Department. On the home page click on 'Apply' under 'Chhattisgarh Unorganized Workers State Social Security Board'. Enter the following details, Select Group Name: 'Asangathit Marmakaar Mandal' Select Service: 'Asangathit Shramik Panjikaran' What do you want to do: 'Aavedan' Click next. Check the eligibility criteria for registration in Chhattisgarh Unorganized Workers State Social Security Board and click next. Fill out the online 'Registration form'. Submit.

faqs.question: How to apply for the scheme?
faqs.answer: All the applicant have to visit the official website Chhattisgarh Labour Department. On the home page click on 'Apply' under 'Chhattisgarh Unorganized Workers State Social Security Board'. Provide the required details. Fill out the application form. Submit.
